FAQ / Wave 5 / Battle Cards /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Hand-To-Hand Combat

  1. Which cards have Trait Battle Icons?
    The following cards have Trait Battle Icons:
    - Concealing Contrails (Plane)
    - Hand-To-Hand Combat (Melee)
    - Headbutt (Titan Master)
    - Hull Down (Tank)
    - Lock on Target (Plane)
    - Master of Metallikato (Specialist/Ranged/Melee)
    - Nitro Booster (Car)
    - Paralyzo Box (Ranged)
    - Spymaster's Ruse (Specialist)
